name: Super Market Grocery Shop
description:
Expert in apps offers a new stylish Supermarket Grocery Shop game for girls, categorised as food shopping games for girls.

The latest food shopping store is in the heart of city and easily accessible to new customers. Expert supermarket management ensures all the healthier rules & regulations. Our management has offered latest cash register table & credit card facility

Take the items and scan them at the register - place the produce, and other food items on the scale, and weigh them to price them all out!

Tag the produce like fruit and veggies, and put price tags on the bags!

Then get ready to check the customer out! Scan the items, and check the customer out using a realistic Supermarket Cash Register!

Punch in the prices for the items, and swipe the credit card to complete the transaction!

Choose from a variety of Grocery Aisles like Fruit and Vegetables, Cupcakes & Candy, Bread & Milk, Meat & Fish! Even choose to restock the supply room, and let the customer purchase items from there!

*************** About Prophetic Application *************

We are entirely devoted to build user friendly games related to fun and learning for better educational familiarities and enjoyment for Children and all peoples. Stay with us for the latest updates of Prophetic Application on App Store and get more of games.

Don't forget to give us a good rate if you enjoy our game!
